description: Create a professional construction company website with hero section featuring the logo, headline 'Sert Yapı Sistemi - Güvenilir İnşaat Çözümleri', subheadline, and call-to-action button
Add a services section with 4 main services: Bina Konstruksiyonu, Altyapı Projeleri, Teknik Danışmanlık, and Onarım & Bakım with icons and descriptions
Add an about section describing company expertise, experience, and commitment to quality with professional tone
Add a projects/portfolio section showcasing completed projects with images and descriptions
Add a contact section with contact information, email, phone, and a contact form with name, email, phone, message fields
Add footer with company info, quick links, services, contact info, and copyright - use brand colors (navy blue #1a3a52 and orange #ff8c00)
Ensure the design uses the logo brand colors (navy blue and orange), professional typography, and is fully responsive on mobile and desktop
Remove all CTA buttons from the website (hero buttons, contact form buttons, etc.)

Replace the contact form section with social media links. Add professional social media icons for Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and WhatsApp with clickable links. Style them with hover effects using the brand colors (navy blue and orange)
Improve overall design aesthetics - enhance spacing, add more visual appeal, improve shadows and gradients, make the layout more premium and polished
Keep contact information (phone, email, address) but remove the contact form completely
Ensure social media section is prominent and visually attractive with smooth hover animations
Redesign hero section with a stunning visual background, add gradient overlays, improve typography with better hierarchy, make it more eye-catching and premium
Upgrade services section - add beautiful service icons/illustrations, improve card design with better shadows and hover effects, add smooth animations
Enhance projects portfolio section - add high-quality project images, improve project cards with better layouts, add project categories/filters, create impressive hover effects
Redesign the entire layout with better color gradients, improve spacing and padding, add modern design elements like dividers and accent shapes, make it more visually polished
Improve social media section - make the icons larger and more prominent, add better styling with gradient backgrounds, create smooth animations on hover
Add modern navbar with smooth scrolling navigation, sticky header, improve mobile menu styling, add logo to navbar
Enhance footer design with better organization, add more sections, improve visual hierarchy, make it more premium and professional
